app.title: MIPYao Portfoliio
app.description: MIPYao portfolio is a modern and open-source developers portfolio template that can automatically import Github profile and repository information, made by Vue/Nuxt ecosystem, Octokit APIs and other modern web technologies.
index.title: Index
index.description: Discover a showcase of frontend, backend and full-stack projects built with Vue, Nuxt, Svelte, Astro, Vite, TailwindCSS, Less, Sass, Resend, MongoDB, Node and Nuxt's official libraries, etc. Explore the works of passionate developers and find inspiration for your next portfolio project.
login.title: Login to MIPYao Portfolio
login.description: Login to MIPYao portfolio to get permission for comment panel.
register.title: Register an Account
register.description: Register an account to MIPYao portfolio.
home.title: Home
home.description: Home page for MIPYao portfolio, here you can explore my passionate projects that built with Vue, Nuxt, Svelte, Astro, Vite, TailwindCSS, Less, Sass Resend, MongoDB, Node and other modern web technologies, and access my github repository or online demo to get detailed project information.
about.title: About MIPYao
about.description: About page for MIPYao portfolio, here you can get detailed information such as skills and fields of study about MIPYao, who is a passionate frontend developer
career.title: MIPYao's Career
career.description: Career page for MIPYao portfolio, here you can get detailed information about MIPYao's career and work experience, such as which company did MIPYao worked for, what role did MIPYao played in that company, when and where did MIPYao joined that company, and what works or projects did MIPYao worked on, etc.
schedule.title: MIPYao's Schedule
schedule.description: Schedule page for MIPYao portfolio, here you can get detailed information about MIPYao's schedule and career plan of annual year, you can also learn the detailed content by click the schedule card to jump to MIPYao Blog.
comments.title: Comments
comments.description: Comments page for MIPYao portfolio, here you can view all the comments from visitors, and you can also login to MIPYao portfolio to leave your comments or suggestions to this project.
contact.title: Contact with MIPYao
contact.description: Contact page for MIPYao portfolio, here you can get detailed contact information about MIPYao, such as email, phone number, address, etc. You can also fill the contact form to send message to MIPYao, and MIPYao will get back to you across the email address you left as soon as possible.
